ProductInfo.Features:
Kit Includes 16 Products -- All Brand New with Manufacturer supplied accessories, and Warranty:
Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens and Canon 75-300mm III Zoom Lens + Transcend 64 GB Class 10 SD Card
45x Wide Angle Lens (58mm) + 2.5x Telephoto Lens (58mm) + LP-E12 High Capacity Lithium-Ion Battery Pack + 2 58mm UV Filters
SDHC Card Reader + Large Camera and Lens Case + Memory Card Wallet + Digital Camera Cleaning Kit
Extra Lens Cap + CapKeeper + Screen Protector + 50-Inch Tripod --- Exclusive by TheImagingWorld
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card and Reader + Battery + Case + Filters + Tripod + Telephoto & Wide Angle Lens + Accessory Kit
